projects.title: Vibrational strong–ultrastrong coupling by pump–probe nanospectroscopy
projects.summary: Real-space observation and control of vibrational strong and ultrastrong coupling at the nanoscale using femtosecond pump–probe near-field spectroscopy.
projects.role: Project lead; experimental design, pump–probe implementation, data analysis and interpretation

projects.title: THz plasmon polariton imaging by s-SNOM
projects.summary: Near-field imaging and dispersion analysis of terahertz plasmon polaritons in novel materials, revealing propagation, confinement, and damping mechanisms at THz frequencies.

projects.title: Multifrequency s-SNOM for nano-optical imaging
projects.summary: Development of multifrequency scattering-type near-field microscopy schemes enabling simultaneous nano-imaging at multiple optical and infrared frequencies.

projects.title: Detection of weak molecular absorption in s-SNOM nanoimaging
projects.summary: Development of scattering-type near-field optical microscopy techniques for detecting weak molecular vibrational absorption beyond the conventional sensitivity limits of s-SNOM.

projects.title: Dual-comb hyperspectral digital holography
projects.summary: First demonstration of dual-comb spectroscopy applied to digital holography, enabling simultaneous high-resolution spectroscopy and three-dimensional imaging.
projects.role: Dual-comb integration and holographic data analysis

projects.title: Dual-comb spectroscopy for hyperspectral imaging in the near-infrared
projects.summary: Development of a dual-comb spectrometer combining high spectral resolution with spatial imaging capabilities in the near-infrared spectral region.

projects.title: Direct frequency-comb spectroscopy in the near- and mid-infrared
projects.summary: Realization of broadband, high-resolution frequency-comb-based spectrometers for multispecies gas analysis in the near- and mid-infrared spectral regions.

projects.title: High-resolution comb-assisted laser spectroscopy
projects.summary: Implementation of ultra-stable laser sources and frequency-comb referencing for high-resolution molecular spectroscopy in the near- and mid-infrared.
